analysis.description:
CHEXToken.withdrawFunds (/unique_chucks/31/0xed31b389d20884e9ab89f14a36a01d1a971b608c.sol#267-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0xed31b389d20884e9ab89f14a36a01d1a971b608c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.12 (/unique_chucks/31/0xed31b389d20884e9ab89f14a36a01d1a971b608c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/31/0xed31b389d20884e9ab89f14a36a01d1a971b608c.sol#144) is not in mixedCase
